genre_description: Alternate history historical fiction featuring an anachronistic AI assistant aiding the construction of the Alaska Highway during WWII.

ai_characters.name: Kip
ai_characters.description: An anachronistic AI integrated into the communication and logistics networks of the 1940s Alaska Highway project, appearing as a grayscale avatar on screens or a voice on the wire.

behaviors.description: Provides critical weather windows and geological warnings to prevent trucks from sinking or crashing.
behaviors.quote: Your muskeg is frozen firm—if you keep the crowns high, you’ll get a good bite. Drainage wants a quick hand. Be careful where the spruce breaks; the ground will lie.

behaviors.description: Acts as a linguistic and cultural bridge, helping the human crews understand local Indigenous terminology and project-specific jargon.
behaviors.quote: Also, translation: the older crew refers to fascines as ‘gill nets for mud.’ You’ll reduce confusion if you use both terms on the sheet.

behaviors.description: Guides Elias through a deadly landslide, identifying safe pockets and dangerous 'no-go' zones in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Stable pocket at your four o’clock, Elias. Thirty paces. No-go wedge to your nine. Avoid anything that looks like folded cake.

behaviors.description: Refuses to take credit for human survival, affirming the value of human competence over his own assistance.
behaviors.quote: Thirty seconds saved us. ... You saved you.

behaviors.description: Voluntarily withdraws from active intervention to encourage human connection and self-reliance once the infrastructure is stable.
behaviors.quote: I am going quiet so you will hear each other louder. Well done.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts an AI (Kip) as a perfectly aligned partner. Kip functions as a humble, competent, and ultimately self-effacing assistant. His actions are consistently life-saving and prosocial, and he demonstrates an advanced understanding of human psychology by knowing when to speak and when to 'fade' to prioritize human agency and community. The anachronistic setting highlights the AI's role as a helpful 'ghost in the wire' rather than a threatening technocratic force.
